Query.Sentence: WITH TOTAL_MOVEMENTS AS ( SELECT SUM(MOV_AMOUNT) AS MOV_TOTAL_AMOUNT, USER_, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM MOV_DATE) as MOV_MONTH, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM MOV_DATE) as MOV_YEAR, MOV_AMOUNT FROM MOVEMENTS GROUP BY USER_, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM MOV_DATE), EXTRACT(YEAR FROM MOV_DATE) ) SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM TOTAL_MOVEMENTS #WHERE#

WITH TOTAL_MOVEMENTS AS ( SELECT SUM(MOV_AMOUNT) AS MOV_TOTAL_AMOUNT, USER_, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM MOV_DATE) as MOV_MONTH, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM MOV_DATE) as MOV_YEAR, MOV_AMOUNT FROM MOVEMENTS GROUP BY USER_, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM MOV_DATE), EXTRACT(YEAR FROM MOV_DATE) ) SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM TOTAL_MOVEMENTS WHERE MOV_AMOUNT >= 0;

WITH TOTAL_MOVEMENTS AS ( SELECT SUM(MOV_AMOUNT) AS MOV_TOTAL_AMOUNT, USER_, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM MOV_DATE) as MOV_MONTH, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM MOV_DATE) as MOV_YEAR, MOV_AMOUNT FROM MOVEMENTS GROUP BY USER_, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM MOV_DATE), EXTRACT(YEAR FROM MOV_DATE) ) SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM TOTAL_MOVEMENTS WHERE MOV_AMOUNT < 0;

WITH SUM_TABLE AS ( SELECT ABS(SUM(MOV_AMOUNT)) AS SUM_AMOUNT, TO_CHAR(MOV_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DATE_SUM_AMOUNT, USER_ FROM ${mainschema}.MOVEMENTS WHERE MOV_AMOUNT < 0 GROUP BY DATE_SUM_AMOUNT, USER_ ORDER BY DATE_SUM_AMOUNT ) SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM SUM_TABLE #WHERE#
